products.title: Splash Ruby Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash ruby red roller blind in red. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash ruby red is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash ruby red roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2101 fabric colour: ruby red material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash scarlet red roller blind in red. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home!
This bright, bold, scarlet red roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously.Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.This red roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash scarlet red electric roller blind in red. Made to measure from 133.32 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash scarlet red electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold red roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.  At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product id: db-erbx2048 fabric colour: scarlet red material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
